verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3927>Lemuel;<s%> the <S%H4853>oracle<s%> which his <S%H517>mother<s%> taught <S%H3256>him.<s%>
<S%H1248>"Oh,<s%> my son! <S%H1248>Oh,<s%> son of my <S%H990>womb!<s%> <S%H1248>Oh,<s%> son of my <S%H5088>vows!<s%>
<S%H5414>Don't<s%> give your <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H802>women,<s%> nor your <S%H1870>ways<s%> to that which <S%H4229>destroys<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

It is not for <S%H4428>kings,<s%> <S%H3927>Lemuel;<s%> it is not for <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine;<s%> nor <S%H335>for<s%> <S%H7336>princes<s%> to <S%H7941>say,<s%> 'Where is strong drink?'
lest they <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H2710>law,<s%> and <S%H8138>pervert<s%> the <S%H1779>justice<s%> due to anyone who is <S%H1121>afflicted.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> to him who is ready to <S%H6>perish;<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> to the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> in <S%H5315>soul:<s%>
Let him <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> his <S%H7389>poverty,<s%> and <S%H2142>remember<s%> his misery no <S%H5999>more.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> for the <S%H483>mute,<s%> in the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of all who are <S%H1121>left<s%> <S%H2475>desolate.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously,<s%> and <S%H1777>serve<s%> justice to the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>"
Who can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H2428>worthy<s%> <S%H802>woman?<s%> For her <S%H4377>price<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> above <S%H6443>rubies.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of her <S%H1167>husband<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in <S%H2637>her.<s%> He shall have no lack of <S%H7998>gain.<s%>
She <S%H1580>does<s%> him <S%H2896>good,<s%> and not <S%H7451>harm,<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2416>life.<s%>
She <S%H1875>seeks<s%> <S%H6785>wool<s%> and <S%H6593>flax,<s%> and <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H2656>eagerly<s%> with her <S%H3709>hands.<s%>
She is like the <S%H5503>merchant<s%> <S%H591>ships.<s%> She <S%H935>brings<s%> her <S%H3899>bread<s%> from <S%H4801>afar.<s%>
She <S%H6965>rises<s%> also while it is yet <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2964>food<s%> to her <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H2706>portions<s%> for her servant <S%H5291>girls.<s%>
She <S%H2161>considers<s%> a <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3947>buys<s%> <S%H6529>it.<s%> With the fruit of her <S%H3709>hands,<s%> she <S%H5193>plants<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>
She <S%H2296>arms<s%> her <S%H4975>waist<s%> with <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and makes her <S%H2220>arms<s%> <S%H5797>strong.<s%>
She <S%H2938>perceives<s%> that her <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> is <S%H2896>profitable.<s%> Her <S%H5216>lamp<s%> <S%H3518>doesn't<s%> go out by <S%H3915>night.<s%>
She <S%H7971>lays<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H6418>distaff,<s%> and her <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H8551>hold<s%> the <S%H3601>spindle.<s%>
She <S%H6566>opens<s%> her <S%H3709>arms<s%> to the <S%H6041>poor;<s%> <S%H7971>yes,<s%> she extends her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H34>needy.<s%>
She is not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow<s%> for her <S%H1004>household;<s%> for all her <S%H1004>household<s%> are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8144>scarlet.<s%>
She <S%H6213>makes<s%> for herself carpets of <S%H4765>tapestry.<s%> Her <S%H3830>clothing<s%> is fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> and <S%H713>purple.<s%>
Her <S%H1167>husband<s%> is <S%H3045>respected<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> when he <S%H3427>sits<s%> among the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
She <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H5466>linen<s%> garments and <S%H4376>sells<s%> <S%H5414>them,<s%> and delivers <S%H2289>sashes<s%> to the <S%H3669>merchant.<s%>
<S%H5797>Strength<s%> and <S%H1926>dignity<s%> are her <S%H3830>clothing.<s%> She <S%H7832>laughs<s%> at the <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H314>come.<s%>
She <S%H6605>opens<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> <S%H2617>Faithful<s%> <S%H8451>instruction<s%> is on her <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
She looks <S%H6822>well<s%> to the <S%H1979>ways<s%> of her <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H398>doesn't<s%> eat the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6104>idleness.<s%>
Her <S%H1121>children<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> and call her <S%H833>blessed.<s%> Her <S%H1167>husband<s%> also praises <S%H1984>her:<s%>
<S%H7227>"Many<s%> <S%H1323>women<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>noble<s%> <S%H5927>things,<s%> but you excel them all."
<S%H2580>Charm<s%> is <S%H8267>deceitful,<s%> and <S%H3308>beauty<s%> is <S%H1892>vain;<s%> but a <S%H802>woman<s%> who <S%H3373>fears<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> she shall be <S%H1984>praised.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> her of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands!<s%> Let her <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> her in the <S%H8179>gates!<s%>
